response.overview: Isabell Shipardâ€™s passion and internationally respected research into herbs is delivered in this self-paced herb course on DVD. The course takes you deeper into many topics including: herbs as medicine and for good health; useful herbs for your garden; plant families; weeds you can eat; poisonous plants; methods of using herbs; plants as sweeteners; income opportunities from plants; survival foods and seed saving.
response.tagline: Opens the door to discovering how to use herbs for health.
response.title: The Wonderful World of Herbs
